sources.title: Train to Tombstone (1950) Don 'Red' Barry | Action, Adventure | Full Movie | subtitles
sources.description:
As a group of passengers traveling through the rugged and dangerous landscape of the Old West, on a train to Tombstone, they encounter bandits, Native American attacks, and one of the passengers decides to rob it of the $250,000 it is carrying.

Colorized version: https://youtu.be/jgpQZx5ekqw

Original title: Train to Tombstone (1950) 


Director: William Berke
Writers: Don 'Red' Barry, Orville H. Hampton, Victor West
Stars: Don 'Red' Barry, Robert Lowery, Wally Vernon
Genre: Western, Action, Adventure, Romance


00:00 Full Movie (With subtitles)
02:42 Mysterious events unfold on a train journey to Tombstone, involving a paralyzed woman, a doctor, and a gambling hall.
07:17 Intense journey on a train with rifles, ammunition, and mysterious passengers heading to Tombstone.
14:40 Passenger causes chaos on a train to Tombstone with a desire to open a new establishment.
21:28 Mysterious events unfold on a train journey to Tombstone, involving a paralyzed man, a gambler, and a young woman.
29:38 Undercover marshals on a train suspect a passenger named Howard to be a criminal plant, leading to a showdown with attacking Indians.
40:09 Unexpected events unfold on a train journey, revealing hidden motives and alliances.
46:49 The final chase scene & shoot-out 


@CultCinemaClassics


https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=UUMOycDFnpMeWzaITQSD1dWsOA

metadata.Plot: Len Howard has been sent to protect a large gold shipment that is on a train traveling from Albuquerque to Tombstone. First he passes out guns so the passengers can fight off an Indian attack. Then when a gang dressed as Indians attack, he helps fight them off and identifies their leader who is one of the passengers.
metadata.Writer: Don 'Red' Barry, Orville H. Hampton, Victor West
metadata.Actors: Don 'Red' Barry, Robert Lowery, Wally Vernon
